funFacts.title: NASA's Alien Font Adventure
funFacts.description: NASA uses alien-style fonts on spacecraft plaques to help future archaeologists distinguish between human and machine engravings. It's a fascinating way to ensure our technology is recognized as human-made in the distant future.

funFacts.title: Unicode's Alien Symbols
funFacts.description: Did you know Unicode has included 94 'alien emojis'? Often mistaken for decorative dividers, these symbols add a fun twist to your text, making it look like it’s straight from another galaxy.
